item.title: KORG Gadget for PlayStation announced for PS5, now available
item.content:encoded:
• PS5

Music production software priced at $49.99

DETUNE has announced music production software KORG Gadget for PlayStation for PlayStation 5. It is available now via PlayStation Store for $49.99.

The PlayStation 5 version follows DETUNE’s previous releases of KORG Gadget for Nintendo Switch and KORG Gadget VR.

Here is an overview of the software, via DETUNE:

Produced by the world-renowned electronic musical instrument manufacturer KORG Inc., the award-winning music production software KORG Gadget is now available on PlayStation!

The KORG Gadget for PlayStation includes 16 gadget instruments required for music creation. In addition to numerous unique synthesizers, ready-to-use two drum machines are all included. All gadgets have sophisticated adjustable parameters for rapidly producing all manner of sounds. You will find inspiring sounds quickly and easily.

Additionally, the user interface—one of KORG Gadget‘s most impressive features—has been further refined with a game-like 3D design. Sound, Sequence, and Mix are contained in an intuitive layout, and allow for seamless music creation.

It’s a groundbreaking music production studio that offers a uniquely immersive experience, unlike any other software, elevating your creativity to new heights.
